routes.documentation: Retrieve the full chart of accounts

responses.body:
{
  "Accounts": [
    {
      "AccountID": "50e845c3-464e-4a6d-8951-8794317c7893",
      "BankAccountNumber": 1234353453453,
      "BankAccountType": "{{oneOf (array 'BANK' 'CREDITCARD' 'PAYPAL')}}",
      "Class": "{{oneOf (array 'ASSET' 'EQUITY' 'EXPENSE' 'LIABILITY' 'REVENUE')}}",
      "Code": 200,
      "CurrencyCode": "AUD",
      "Description": "A sales account",
      "EnablePaymentsToAccount": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "HasAttachments": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "Name": "Sales",
      "ReportingCode": "ASS",
      "ReportingCodeName": "Asset",
      "ShowInExpenseClaims": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "Status": "{{oneOf (array 'ACTIVE' 'ARCHIVED')}}",
      "SystemAccount": "{{oneOf (array 'DEBTORS' 'CREDITORS' 'BANKCURRENCYGAIN' 'GST' 'GSTONIMPORTS' 'HISTORICAL' 'REALISEDCURRENCYGAIN' 'RETAINEDEARNINGS' 'ROUNDING' 'TRACKINGTRANSFERS' 'UNPAIDEXPCLM' 'UNREALISEDCURRENCYGAIN' 'WAGEPAYABLES')}}",
      "TaxType": "NONE",
      "Type": "{{oneOf (array 'BANK' 'CURRENT' 'CURRLIAB' 'DEPRECIATN' 'DIRECTCOSTS' 'EQUITY' 'EXPENSE' 'FIXED' 'INVENTORY' 'LIABILITY' 'NONCURRENT' 'OTHERINCOME' 'OVERHEADS' 'PREPAYMENT' 'REVENUE' 'SALES' 'TERMLIAB' 'PAYGLIABILITY' 'SUPERANNUATIONEXPENSE' 'SUPERANNUATIONLIABILITY' 'WAGESEXPENSE' 'WAGESPAYABLELIABILITY')}}",
      "UpdatedDateUTC": "{{faker 'date.recent' 365}}"
    }
  ],
  "DateTimeUTC": "{{faker 'date.recent' 365}}",
  "ID": "8904103f-f25e-4af2-887a-f5d3acace293",
  "ProviderName": "My Awesome App",
  "Status": "OK"
}
responses.label: A successful response
An unexpected error occured.

routes.documentation: Retrieve a collection of linked transactions (billable expenses)

responses.body:
{
  "DateTimeUTC": "{{faker 'date.recent' 365}}",
  "ID": "8904103f-f25e-4af2-887a-f5d3acace293",
  "LinkedTransactions": [
    {
      "ContactID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "LinkedTransactionID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "SourceLineItemID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "SourceTransactionID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "SourceTransactionTypeCode": "",
      "Status": "{{oneOf (array 'DRAFT' 'APPROVED' 'ONDRAFT' 'BILLED' 'VOIDED')}}",
      "TargetLineItemID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "TargetTransactionID": "{{faker 'random.uuid'}}",
      "Type": "{{oneOf (array 'BILLABLEEXPENSE')}}",
      "UpdatedDateUTC": "{{faker 'date.recent' 365}}"
    }
  ],
  "ProviderName": "My Awesome App",
  "Status": "OK"
}
responses.label: A successful response

    {
      "APIKey": "HJSONEEWGDGATQAL1VSWAZ0XHME0DV",
      "Addresses": [
        {
          "AddressLine1": "Apartment A",
          "AddressLine2": "Building 20",
          "AddressLine3": "123 Main St",

          "Region": "New York"
        }
      ],
      "BaseCurrency": "AUD",
      "CountryCode": "AU",
      "CreatedDateUTC": "{{faker 'date.recent' 365}}",
      "DefaultPurchasesTax": "{{oneOf (array 'Inclusive' 'Exclusive' 'NoTax')}}",
      "DefaultSalesTax": "{{oneOf (array 'Inclusive' 'Exclusive' 'NoTax')}}",
      "EndOfYearLockDate": "{{date '2019' (now) 'yyyy-MM-dd'}}",

        {
          "LinkType": "{{oneOf (array 'Facebook' 'GooglePlus' 'LinkedIn' 'Twitter' 'Website')}}",
          "Url": "http://twitter.com/xeroapi"

          "PhoneAreaCode": 3,
          "PhoneCountryCode": 1,
          "PhoneNumber": "9885 4589",
          "PhoneType": "{{oneOf (array 'DEFAULT' 'DDI' 'MOBILE' 'FAX')}}"
